# llms.txt - Guidelines for AI/LLM crawlers

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 2

# Project metadata
Owner: Owl20 (Starry Shores D&D Community)
Repository: https://github.com/uberdragon/owl20
Contact: https://github.com/uberdragon/owl20/issues

# Usage policy for AI crawlers
# You may crawl and index this site for search, summarization, and QA purposes.
# Do not use this content for model training without prior permission.
